Articles.Content: Has anyone else noticed that the textures seem to be a much poorer resolution?.... Or is this just me. I seem to remember things being cleaner and not as fuzzy, and It's really bothering me. Now granted, I have been really inactive with keeping up in the community and have only been reading the Devnote Tuesdays posts as of late.
Someone said they defaulted to half-res now. check your settings and set textures to full-res.

> 
> Someone said they defaulted to half-res now. check your settings and set textures to full-res.

Exactly this, a new settings file will default to half res
